FuncDef: This command enables the automatic creation of an RSVP point-to-point LSP to a destination node whose router-id matches a prefix in the specified peer prefix policy. This LSP type is referred to as auto-LSP of type mesh.
CLIs: auto-lsp lsp-template <template-name> { policy peer-prefix-policy [ peer-prefix-policy ] | one-hop }

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an LSP template name, up to 32 characters in length.
Specifies an peer prefix policy name, up to 32 characters in length.
Enables the automatic signaling of one-hop point-to-point LSPs.
